code: import i18n from'i18next';import Backend from'i18next-xhr-backend';import{initReactI18next}from'react-i18next';i18n.use(Backend).use(initReactI18next).init({lng:'ru',backend:{/* translation file path */loadPath:'/assets/i18n/{{ns}}/{{lng}}.json'},fallbackLng:'ru',debug:true,/* can have multiple namespace, in case you want to divide a huge translation into smaller pieces and load them on demand */ns:['translations'],defaultNS:'translations',keySeparator:false,interpolation:{escapeValue:false,formatSeparator:','},react:{useSuspense:false,wait:true}});export default i18n;
